directions: Remove the meat from the lobsters, chopping any large chunks into bite-size pieces. In a bowl, combine the lobster meat, mayonnaise, lemon juice, celery, parsley, and salt and pepper to taste.
Brush cut sides of the rolls with melted butter and fill with the lobster salad.
ingredients: 4 (1 1/2-pound) cooked lobsters or 4 lobster tails or 1 1/2 pounds lobster meat
2 inner celery stalks and leaves, finely chopped
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Lobster Rolls
